Plot: A father and daughter decide to attempt to lead a flock of orphaned Canada Geese south by air.
Title: Fly Away Home
Writer: Bill Lishman (autobiography), Robert Rodat (screenplay), Vince McKewin (screenplay)
Actors: Jeff Daniels, Anna Paquin, Dana Delany, Terry Kinney
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 5 nominations.
